original_text: A process-driven model is presented to build an instinctive and efficient higher educational administrative management system to overcome problems most universities facing. With this model, processes are identified explicitly and the routine of educational administration is broken into small tasks. Each task has designated role of executors. A process describes the activities and relationships among them. A prototype of higher educational administrative system is built with Bonita open solution. The demo shows that the process-driven higher educational administrative system helps end users understand processes they are involved and focus on what to do.
original_translation: Se presenta un modelo basado en procesos para construir un sistema de gestión administrativa educativa superior instintivo y eficiente para superar los problemas que enfrentan la mayoría de las universidades. Con este modelo, los procesos se identifican de manera explícita y la rutina de la administración educativa se divide en tareas pequeñas. Cada tarea tiene un rol designado de ejecutores. Un proceso describe las actividades y las relaciones entre ellas. Se construye un prototipo de sistema administrativo educativo superior con la solución abierta de Bonita. La demostración muestra que el sistema administrativo educativo superior basado en procesos ayuda a los usuarios finales a comprender los procesos en los que están involucrados y a centrarse en qué hacer.

A prototype of higher educational administrative system is built with Bonita open solution.
The demo shows that the process-driven higher educational administrative system helps end users understand processes they are involved and focus on what to do.
